contents.item: Every new day is the gift of a new divine grace.
The greatest joy is the grace of salvation through faith in Jesus Christ.
The doom of destruction is the snare of sin.
God's grace is a gift just as life is a gracious breath.
Whoever calls on the Savior, shall be saved.
With grace of God, we can only be glad.
Grace freely given by God,
Oh God your love is so overwhelming!
Gratitude is only expressed and appreciated in proportion to your understanding of grace.
The grace of God is joyous gladness.
Grace is the fullness of God.
What can you do how much can you give to bring grace and salvation unto even one soul
Faith in Christ Jesus is the grace of God.
The gift of God is grace.The grace of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus.
The Holy God gives grace.
We can do no good, without God's grace,
No work for God's grace.
May the goodness of God's face forever shine on our path.
To repent is to return to God.
God is willing to walk the earth again incarnate in us.
contents.owner: Eugenia Price, Early Will I Seek Thee

contents.item: Love, Mercy, and Grace, sisters all, attend your wounds of silence and hope.
contents.owner: Aberjhani, The River of Winged Dreams

contents.item: There is a hope of salvation for every sinner.
Truly, truly, the grace of God is never without any effect.
Hope is full assurance of faith.
Only with grace, can we reach the goal.
The sweet pleasure of prayer, the grace of the soul.
Life is a great grace.
Ask for God's grace, He freely gives, whoever ask.
The given time is the gracious moment.
If it meant brighter stars, she would follow God into the darkness.
What is the fear of God? The grace to shun evil.
It is better to dwell on the beautiful things in life than the negative.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Cherish your existence, for memories become legacies and life can change in an instant.
The only true religion is the grace to act right.
Until God draws you to himself, can you come close to Him.
Be wise enough to forgive but don't be foolish enough to trust again.
contents.owner: Ikechukwu Izuakor, Great Reflections on Success

contents.item: To reject the Word of God is forsake the holy grace.
No work for grace. It can only be received through faith in Jesus Christ.
Grace is freely given by God, in sacred moment of salvation.
...there is nothing unforgivable and there are no secrets before an all-knowing merciful God.
I will do my very best while there is still grace.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: The royal power is the grace to act right.
Reach out to the fullness of God’s grace strength for any accomplishment.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: You have grace to live your dreams.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: There is a greater grace for every great sin.
The grace of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus.
God, please give us more grace!
The gift is a grace of God.
Whoever shall call on God, shall be saved.
Humanity greatest need is God's grace.
Never give a sword to a man who can't dance.
When life doesn't meet your expectations, it was important to take it with grace.
The gift of time is the grace of today.
Grace will follow us even when we are going the wrong way
Free gift of grace is the great mercy of God.
God gives life, strength and wisdom for every accomplishment.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: To completely understand me you must first accept that I am not you.
contents.owner: Ross Caligiuri, Dreaming in the Shadows

contents.item: Grace is a free gift from God.
I count everything loss, to gain anything under the power of grace in Jesus Christ.
Grace is released more abundantly as you work.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: God's grace is the gift of salvation.
Every decision you make in life will stem from one of two options: love or fear. Choose love.
O God, please give us grace to do the good we must do.
God called us to live a holy life by his grace.
May God give you much grace for every great work.
I am nothing but a ripped fabric stitched together by God's grace.
The Reverence of God is grace to act right.
Without God's grace, the soul is dead in sin.
Even when muddy your wings sparkle bright wonders that heal broken worlds.
contents.owner: Aberjhani, The River of Winged Dreams

contents.item: The Gospel is the throne of much more grace.
All things are important to Elôm, even the little things.
Thank God who set me from all my sins by the power of His free gift of grace.
You must first feel sorry for your sins, to seek the free gift of grace of salvation.
All you need is what you have.
May God overflow your life with bountiful blessings of grace.
With grace, you will succeed despite strong opposition.
We can do what we ought to do, only by great grace that comes from God.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: Dare to love yourselfas if you were a rainbowwith gold at both ends.
contents.owner: Aberjhani, Journey through the Power of the Rainbow: Quotations from a Life Made Out of Poetry

contents.item: Here we go,” Phoenix said, turning back to Nora. “Try not to let this room scare you.
contents.owner: Ross Caligiuri, Dreaming in the Shadows

contents.item: In the grace of the Truth, re-examine all that you have been told.
Do not take the grace of God for granted.
May the grace of faith, keep you going in the forward motion to reach the ultimate goal.
Faith in God is a full force of grace.
Grace is available to us from God, but it is located in our place of work
God is writing His story on the pages of our lives.
Dare the impossible. By grace it will be possible.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: May you will have the grace to complete the task.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Grace is freely given by God.
Politeness is the first thing people lose once they get the power.
Eternity will not cause our memories to fade, it will force our hearts to accept the past.
contents.owner: Ross Caligiuri, Dreaming in the Shadows
